author: vargasa
body:
#### PR description:

Tracker Algorithm Migration ```DDPixBarLayerUpgrade```

#### PR validation:

![Screenshot from 2019-07-25 10-56-24](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16821717/61860837-ecbdcf80-aeca-11e9-8b22-5eebdabea81a.png)

```
cmsRun DetectorDescription/DDCMS/test/python/testDDPixBarLayerUpgradeAlgorithm.py
cmsShow -c $CMSSW_RELEASE_BASE/src/Fireworks/Core/macros/simGeo.fwc --sim-geom-file cmsDD4HepGeom.root --tgeo-name=testPixBarLayerUpgradeAlgo

```

FYI: @ianna
title: DD4Hep: Tracker Algorithm Migration DDPixBarLayerUpgrade
